description: 连接提供商对话框（新版）

replacements.Login with Claude Pro/Max: 使用 Claude Pro/Max 登录 (Login with Claude Pro/Max)
replacements.Select login method for {provider().name: 选择登录方式 (Select login method) - {provider().name}
replacements.API key is required: API 密钥为必填项 (API key is required)
replacements.Authorization code is required: 授权码为必填项 (Authorization code is required)
replacements.Invalid authorization code: 无效的授权码 (Invalid authorization code)
replacements.OpenCode Zen gives you access to a curat: OpenCode Zen 为编码智能体提供精选的可靠优化模型集。(OpenCode Zen gives you access to a curated set of reliable optimized models for coding agents.)
replacements.With a single API key you'll get access: 通过单个 API 密钥，您可以访问 Claude、GPT、Gemini、GLM 等模型。(With a single API key you'll get access to models such as Claude, GPT, Gemini, GLM and more.)
获取您的 API 密钥。(to collect your API key.)
replacements.description: `${provider().name} models: description: `${provider().name} 模型现已可用。(models are now available to use.)`
